arts.ttl: Sky Sport Italia: Paulo Fonseca to be sacked by AC Milan
arts.sum: AC Milan's recent 1-1 draw against AS Roma has intensified speculation that head coach Paulo Fonseca is set to be fired by the club. The match, which was crucial for both teams, ended with neither side able to secure a much-needed victory, leaving Milan dissatisfied with the outcome.
